item.title: Millennial Revenue Reporting
item.description: Ad network revenue reporting allows you to view important metrics from your networks directly in MoPub. Learn more about ad network revenue reporting here. Revenue reporting requires the Millennial Username, Password. Your app name must also exactly match the app name in your Millennial...

item.title: Understanding UTC Time (Time Zones)
item.description: How to read charts in UTC In a chart, each bar in your MoPub interface represents 1 day in UTC time. For example, if you are in Pacific time and looking at yesterday’s data, that represents data starting from 5:00 PM PDT 2 days before until 4:59 PM PDT yesterday. Stated otherwise, it...

item.description: By using Twitter JavaScript, you agree to the Developer Rules of the Road. If you're integrating your site with Twitter using Twitter for Websites and Web Intents, you can enhance your application using JavaScript. By default, widgets-js will find mark-up in a page and convert basic, functional...

item.title: Ad Network Revenue Reporting
item.description: MoPub allows you to view your ad network revenue, impression, and click data, all in one place. item.title: Custom Native Network Setup
item.description: MoPub supports 3rd party Ad Network SDKs through a Custom Native Network implementation. If an Ad Network not listed provides their solution through an SDK, the network may be integrated leveraging MoPub’s Custom Events. item.title: Ad Network Setup
item.description: MoPub allows for the set-up and management of multiple Ad Networks through the MoPub Dashboard. Ad Networks will serve ads to the ad unit ID that is referenced. From within the dashboard, click the Networks tab. From your Network tab, click “Add a Network” MoPub...

item.title: What is MoPub?
item.description: What is MoPub? MoPub is a mobile ad serving platform. We help you monetize your apps more effectively. We offer a free, self-serve product that lets you get started with ad serving quickly while offering sophisticated features that you will need as you grow. With streamlined campaign management,...

item.title: Technical Integration FAQ
item.description: I’m testing my ad unit and nothing is happening. Why? At the moment, ad units that aren't receiving ad requests from live traffic get removed from our ad servers periodically. When the ad unit starts receiving traffic again, the information gets loaded on those machines and there's a...

item.title: How To Integrate Facebook Audience Network Using Custom Events
item.description: You can work with Facebook's Audience Network using Custom Events the same way you can with other ad network on MoPub. MoPub's pre-built Custom Event adapter makes this process even simpler. For more information on Custom Events, see Setting Up Ad Networks. Important Note: These Custom...
